observationLevels.description: A vast entrance hall that extends infinitely upward. The walls are lined with non-Euclidean architecture.
The geometry actively resists measurement. Each floor above appears larger than the one below.
The atrium exists in a controlled spatial loop. Those who fall from the infinite height land where they started.
observationLevels.notes: Hidden maintenance tunnels contain the bodies of workers lost in the recursive geometry.

observationLevels.description: Networks of platforms and bridges woven between massive tree branches. Glows with bioluminescent light.
The entire settlement is alive, grown rather than built. Buildings are hollow trees shaped by generations.
Each structure contains the memory-patterns of its creators. The trees dream of the humans they once were.
observationLevels.origin: Voluntary colonization during the Green Dream protocol
observationLevels.notes: The central tree still receives mail for residents who transformed decades ago.

observationLevels.description: Pools of liquid memory surrounded by crystallized time. Drinking grants temporary knowledge.
Each pool contains extracted memories of specific individuals. Some pools have turned black with trauma.
The oases are mass graves of consciousness. Thousands of minds were drained to create these repositories.
observationLevels.notes: Sometimes you can hear them screaming in the ripples.
